message.name: ERR_ALL_MEMBERS_MUST_BE_REGISTERED_PERSONS_TO_TRANSFER_APPLICATION
message.locale: The application cannot be transferred to an existing case until all prospect persons on the application have been registered.

message.name: ERR_ALL_MEMBERS_ON_EXISTING_CASE_MUST_BE_REGISTERED_PERSONS
message.locale: This application cannot be transferred to the existing case (%1s), until all prospect persons on the case have been registered.
